availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: A Kentucky-born miller. Residence: Dover, Mason County, Kentucky. Widowed four times. Married five times (four times before 1865). Married Cynthia E. Patton in 1840, Sarah B. Evans in 1841, Amanda M. Elrod in 1846, and Mary J. Metcalfe in 1860.

bibl.p: Ancestry.com family tree of username nancyeh77, https://www.ancestry.com/family-tree/person/tree/5538126/person/56000544165/facts (accessed 16 May 2017).
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Dover, District 3, p. 57.
Obituary of William Tabb, The Maysville Evening Bulletin, 27 Aug 1889, 3, https://www.newspapers.com/image/71103973/?terms=Tabb (accessed 16 May 2017).
